1517046607_1AnFGL613gYqFWm4Lhwdk6x5gCRe1.body:
> [mnemonic](#comment_16_1AnFGL613gYqFWm4Lhwdk6x5gCRe1tPFxE): Now I have to provide the private key to sign it, I guess there is no way to go around that right?

i believe if you open your users.json file and look at the entry for the site you made, you can enter the private key in a string that goes:
`"privatekey": "your private key here"`
once you do that the gui might stop asking you for your private key. the gui doesn't work for me most of the time so i do it via cli anyway.
